title: Add shiny animated footer credit label

requirements.summary: Add a subtle, school-theme-friendly shine animation to a global footer credit label with exact text "Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon", respecting reduced-motion preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays the exact text "Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon" on all pages that render the shared layout/footer.
The credit text has a visible but subtle shine animation (e.g., moving highlight) without harming readability.
The shine animation respects users who prefer reduced motion (when `prefers-reduced-motion: reduce` is set, the animation is disabled or replaced with a non-animated style).
No user-facing text is added in any language other than English.

file_operations.description: Update the shared layout footer to include a dedicated credit label that renders the exact text "Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon" on all pages using AppLayout, and apply a custom CSS class for the subtle shine effect (no routing/auth changes).

Add the custom CSS (Tailwind-compatible) for the footer credit shine effect, including keyframes and a `@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)` override to disable/neutralize the animation while keeping the text readable and consistent with the existing school-friendly theme.
